Description: Small fragment of papyrus inscribed in black ink with Coptic texts; one side bears 5 lines written along the fibres, while there are 4 lines on the other side written against the fibres.
Curator's comments: Fragment of a letter to a bishop, probably Pesenthius.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380776) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380776)
Ede 1972- / Writing and lettering in antiquity (no. 59)
